title: Workshop on crypto-AML
subtitle: privacy preserving crypto-AML tools
abstract:
I plan to organise a workshop on privacy preserving Crypto AML tools.

Open Source Blockchain explorers are the most common basic tool.

I would like to give some examples of AML use-cases and see what can be studied using local full nodes without leaking any data to external service providers. 

Such software and knowledge is not only needed to financial intermediaries, but is absolutely crucial to have for our society.
